item.name: Home
item.description: That Time I Went To Rome And Ate Panzanella. One of the first things I ever ate in Italy was Panzanella, which is what inspired me to come up with a simplified Easy Peasy Panzenella. It was summer and we were staying in a tiny but beautiful flat in Trastevere, one of my favorite parts […]
